spec_data.Name: texlive-texilikechaps
spec_data.Description:
The package enables the user to reduce the size of the rather
large chapter headings in standard classes into a texi-like
smaller format. Details of the format may be controlled with
internal commands.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Sun 06 Aug 2017 07:54:04 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Format chapters with a texi-like format
